MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11  postcode area  of Edinburgh, affecting properties in  Whitson Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:51pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:26pm on the 28th of April 2021
